column4: hello, Ive just started installing gusty from CD, the disk has booted and an X session has started but it seems to have hung, the CD is still being read loads and the session isnt dead (mouse cursor is moveable) tty1 is avail, any ideas?
try to kill X-session by ctrl-alt-del... may be re-started X should be fine.
I have something similar under Qemu/VirtualBox.
do you use i386 or x86_64 installation? Ubuntu? Kubuntu?
